credit_line: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
title: Quick Sketch of Landscape with Large Trees
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
medium: Pen and black ink on off-white wove paper
description: Landscape with two large, dark, bare trees at left. (Possible) lake/pond at right with (possible) small boat and figures. Stand of trees in center distance, hills in right background. Miscellaneous pen in bottom margin outside image.
name: Sketchbook folio
